name: Void From Below
description:
VOID FROM BELOW

  • Team Name: KronoShark
  • Email Address: chrodulus@gmail.com
  • Game Name: Void From Below

Travel between the world above to the dark void world below to progress and escape the maze and every growing darkness. 

Sourced (non-original) assets list:

  • Code: First Person Shooter Template
  • Music: Fireside Tales by Darren Curtis | https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/
  • Sounds: Various sounds from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/
  • More Sounds From: Fantasy Interface Sounds - Cafofo Music
  • Font: Roboto
  • Icons: Icons from the wonderful site: https://game-icons.net/
  • Gameplay Footage :

Gameplay Instructions:

KEYBOARD/MOUSE CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse Movement - Look Around / Camera Control
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • E - Pickup Keys
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Shift - Sprint

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • Right Stick - Look Around / Camera Control
  • Right Trigger - Shoot
  • Gamepad Button Top - Pickup Keys
  • Gamepad Button Bottom - Jump
  • Gamepad Button Right (Held) - Sprint

Many plans were scrapped due to time limitations but that's where the fun of the jam comes in. :)
